title: Networking
description: I am educating myself in the field of computer networks. Currently, it is my greatest passion and I associate my future with it. Recently I have passed the CCNA exam.

title: Security Basics
description: I am aware that cybersecurity is one of the most important fields in the current world, which is why I am also gaining knowledge in this topic to further develop my skills. Currently after CCNA I'm planning to get Security+ cert.

title: University
description: I am a student at the Krakow University of Technology. I'm in my 3rd year at the moment. This summer I will be doing a student internship where I hope to gain work experience.
